thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Marais Grands Boulevards - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A gem in the historic center of Paris!
thread.title_full: A gem in the historic center of Paris! - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Marais Grands Boulevards, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: BSPInc
title: A gem in the historic center of Paris!
text: Stayed for one short night at that hotel after a late check-in and early morning rise for a museum exhibit and return flight to NYC: great welcome, very comfortable room on ground floor, prompt check-out, lavish contemporary style interior decoration and great location near old Marais district, two major train stations, Chatelet square and the Grands Boulevards for shopping!
